StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [sp_UpdateMedicalStatus]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@NWA_ID int, @MCRCReceivedDate date.me, @ForwardBUMEDDate date.me, @ReturnMCRCDate date.me, @StatusCode varchar(2), @UserLogin varchar(15) AS
IF EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM MEDICAL_STATUS WHERE NWA_ID = @NWA_ID) BEGIN UPDATE MEDICAL_STATUS SET MCRC_RECEIVED_DATE = @MCRCReceivedDate, BUMED_FORWARD_DATE = @ForwardBUMEDDate, MCRC_RETURN_DATE = @ReturnMCRCDate, MEDICAL_STATUS_DISPOSITION_CODE = @StatusCode, USER_LOGIN = @UserLogin, UPDATE_DATE = GETDATE() WHERE NWA_ID = @NWA_ID END ELSE BEGIN INSERT INTO MEDICAL_STATUS (NWA_ID, MCRC_RECEIVED_DATE, BUMED_FORWARD_DATE, MCRC_RETURN_DATE, MEDICAL_STATUS_DISPOSITION_CODE, USER_LOGIN, UPDATE_DATE) VALUES (@NWA_ID, @MCRCReceivedDate, @ForwardBUMEDDate, @ReturnMCRCDate, @StatusCode, @UserLogin, GETDATE()) END
